other_title: ドラゴンボール 悟空の交通安全 (Japanese)
plot: Goku and the entire gang are on their way to Bulma's house in West City to celebrate her Birthday. Along the way Goku learns learns about safe street crossing rules from a little girl he meets. Krillin and Master Roshi also witness an event that illustrates how children should not run into the street carelessly.
ending_theme: "Makafushigi Adventure!" by Nozawa Masako and Tanaka Mayumi
